title: 기자회견 관리와 Q&A 대응 (Press Conference Management and Q&A)
intent: 기자회견에서 효과적으로 정보를 전달하고 까다로운 질문에 대해 전문적이고 신뢰할 수 있는 답변을 하는 능력을 기른다.
lexset: I'd like to address that question by..., The facts clearly show..., Let me clarify our position on..., We remain committed to..., The data supports our decision to..., I can confirm that..., We will continue to monitor..., That's an important question..., Our policy clearly states..., We are transparent about...

seeds.en: I'd like to address that question with complete clarity.

seeds.kr: 사실은 우리의 결정이 옳았음을 명백히 보여줍니다.
seeds.en: The facts clearly show that our decision was correct.

seeds.kr: 이 문제에 대한 우리의 입장을 명확히 하겠습니다.
seeds.en: Let me clarify our position on this matter.

seeds.kr: 우리는 투명성에 대한 약속을 유지하고 있습니다.
seeds.en: We remain committed to complete transparency.
The data supports our policy decision.
I can confirm that information is accurate.
We will continue to monitor the situation closely.
Our policy clearly states our position.
We are completely transparent about all procedures.
